### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#22962](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22962) (Remove unused SERIALIZE_METHODS on CFeeRate by MarcoFalke)
* [#22626](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22626) (Remove txindex migration code by MarcoFalke)
* [#20640](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/20640) (wallet, refactor: return out-params of CreateTransaction() as optional struct by theStack)
* [#19461](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19461) (multiprocess: Add bitcoin-gui -ipcconnect option by ryanofsky)
* [#19460](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/19460) (multiprocess: Add bitcoin-wallet -ipcconnect option by ryanofsky)
* [#15936](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/15936) (Unify bitcoin-qt and bitcoind persistent settings by ryanofsky)
* [#15294](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/15294) ([moveonly] wallet: Extract RipeMd160 by Empact)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

Concept ACK. I think this is organizationally the right thing to do. Nearly everything in `amount.h` is consensus critical:

- type `CAmount`
- constant `MAX_MONEY`
- function `MoneyRange`

Even `COIN`, though it strictly is a presentation detail, is used in `src/validation.cpp` to set the initial subsidy. So changing it would be consensus critical.
